Package model

Class Model

java.lang.Object
model.Model
public class Model extends Object
Model object handling the data and API requests.

  • Method Details

    • getConvert

      public Convert getConvert(String from, String to, double amount)
      Gets convert from API.
      Parameters:
      from - the start currency code
      to - the end currency code
      amount - the amount
      Returns:
      the convert that stores the start currency code, end currency code, the conversion result.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when the given currency code is not valid

    • getRate

      public Rate getRate(String from, String to, boolean useCache)
      Gets rate. If useCache is true, then it will get the rate from the database. Otherwise, it will get the rate from the API and store as cache.
      Parameters:
      from - the start currency code
      to - the end currency code
      useCache - the use cache or not
      Returns:
      the rate
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when the given currency code is not valid

    • postToPastebin

      public PastebinResult postToPastebin(String text)
      Post to pastebin pastebin result.
      Parameters:
      text - the text to post to pastebin
      Returns:
      the PastebinResult object that contains the url of the pastebin

      Parameters:
      countryName - the country name
      currencyCode - the currency code

      public void remove(String currencyCode)

      Gets countries.
      Returns:
      the HashMap that stores the country name and currency code

    • cacheHit

      public boolean cacheHit(String from, String to)

      Parameters:
      from - the start currency code
      to - the end currency code
      Returns:
      the boolean
